title: 09/09/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/09/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP makes his Super Bowl prediction for the 2021 NFL Season? Is he going chalk, or does he have a sleeper going to the big game? Rick Stroud of the Tampa Bay Times and Tim Cowlishaw of the Dallas Morning News call in to preview tonight's game between the Cowboys and Bucs. And 2x Super Bowl winning QB Eli Manning joins to discuss the alternate broadcast of Monday Night Football that he'll be hosting with his brother Peyton.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
